metadata.title: CVE-2023-45288 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: HTTP/2 CONTINUATION frames can be utilized for DoS attacksThe Go packages net/http and net/http2 packages do not limit thenumber of CONTINUATION frames read for an HTTP/2 request, whichpermits an attacker to provide an arbitrarily large set of headersfor a single request that will be read, decoded, and subsequentlydiscarded, which may result in excessive CPU resource consumption.

criterions.comment: golang-1.10 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
